summary: This document contains a cover sheet and subscriber information related to Cingular Wireless accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and others. It includes details about account statuses, billing addresses, and a subpoena for information related to an ongoing investigation. The document is marked as confidential and subject to protective orders.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: J. Epstein is listed as the financially liable party for a Cingular Wireless account with an active status since November 29, 2004.

persons.name: Thomas Husband
persons.context: Thomas Husband is mentioned as a financially liable party for another Cingular Wireless account.

persons.name: Janusz B
persons.context: Janusz B is listed as a user of a Cingular Wireless account associated with Epstein.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarey is mentioned as the recipient of the fax and is involved in the investigation.

connections.description: Janusz B is listed as a user of the Cingular Wireless account associated with J. Epstein.
Detective Joe Recarey is involved in the investigation concerning J. Epstein.

events.title: Subpoena Compliance
events.description: A subpoena was issued for Cingular Wireless to provide subscriber information related to the investigation.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
